name: sky-puppy
description: A easy to use reliable health checking service with Prometheus export

scripts.version: auto-changelog -l false --sort-commits date-desc --package --hide-credit --template changelog-template.hbs -p && mdsquash -i  CHANGELOG.md && git add -A CHANGELOG.md && git add -A README.md
scripts.postversion: git push &&  git push --tags && npm publish

author: Phara0h
